description: Failed adverse possession - insufficient time period
facts: Bob has occupied the abandoned property for 12 years
His use has been continuous and open
He built a fence and planted trees
The true owner never gave permission
He has paid all property taxes
The statutory period in this jurisdiction is 20 years
asp_facts: claim(c2). claimant(c2, bob). property_type(c2, land). occupation_years(c2, 12). occupation_continuous(c2, yes). occupation_open(c2, yes). occupation_hostile(c2, yes). taxes_paid(c2, yes). statutory_period(c2, 20).
question: Has Bob acquired title through adverse possession?
rationale: Although Bob meets all other requirements (continuous, open, hostile, taxes paid), he has only occupied for 12 years, which is less than the 20-year statutory period required.
